<a id="VisualShaderNodeParameterRef"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeParameterRef

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A reference to an existing [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Creating a reference to a [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) allows you to reuse this parameter in different shaders or shader stages easily.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
